Class PictureInfoEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jpo.PictureInfoEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, PictureInfoChangeListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.event.TreeModelListener, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PictureInfoEditor
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeModelListener, PictureInfoChangeListener

class that creates a JFrame and displays the fields of a picture.

Since:
JDK1.4
Author:
Richard Eigenmann
See Also:
Serialized Form

treeNodesRemoved

public void treeNodesRemoved(javax.swing.event.TreeModelEvent e)
The TreeModelListener interface tells us of tree node removal events. We use this here to determine if the node being displayed is the one removed or whether it is a child of the removed nodes. If so we close the window.

Specified by:
treeNodesRemoved in interface javax.swing.event.TreeModelListener
